title: Tuesday Post Show (8-24-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (8-24-21)
description:
Bobby starts by talking to Caller Katie who had a situation where she was stuck on the side of the road and was inspired after nice people still stopped to help. He also talks about the sad news that the tallest man in the US States has passed away. Bobby also talks about how he doesn’t have a sport that he roots for and always rooting against the teams that everyone liked. Bobby also talked about how his dog Eller killed a rabbit yesterday in the yard.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
